options.text: They are not widely used in the industry

options.label: B

options.label: D

options.label: B

options.label: D

options.label: C
options.text: That they are corrupt and do not represent the interests of the people

options.label: D
options.text: That they are too focused on economic growth and social welfare

multiple-choice.question: What is the main difference between the rise of modern populism and the rise of liberal democracy?

options.label: A
options.text: Liberal democracy prioritizes individual rights, while modern populism prioritizes social welfare

options.label: B
options.text: Liberal democracy seeks compromise and consensus, while modern populism seeks to overturn established institutions

options.label: C
options.text: Liberal democracy is a form of authoritarian government, while modern populism is a form of liberal democracy

options.label: D
options.text: Liberal democracy is a form of monarchy, while modern populism is a form of republic
